document_data.name: ''Lords' Helm''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''Lords' helm''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[bucket helm]] given to all [[Lords of Waterdeep]] and worn only in public with their blank masks. It was one of three pieces of clothing referred to as the [[Lord's ensemble]].
document_data.Powers: A ''Lords' helm'' acted like a ''[[ring of mind shielding]]'', protecting the Lords' mind from unwanted intrusion. Additionally, the ''helm'' changed the wearer's voice to a deep baritone.
